target: Always a no no, always a hesitant, always tired, always floating with the tide of time. Dear you, today's courage is tomorrow's courage, dear you, happiness, health, peace, luck!

target: And now, Hong San wants to give these things to himself. This gift is really too big. "Third Master, just call me by my name from now on. I don't deserve the word "miracle doctor." After a pause, Qin Yang looked up at Hong San and said seriously.

### Idiom: 反躬自责
### Meaning: 回过头来责备自己。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 佛法从根本上揭示“相”和“命”的由来和原理，却不教人去看相、算命；因为这是舍本逐未，徒劳无益的。现在社会上许多人相信占星、看相、算命，把自己的前程，未来的命运，都寄托在这上面，却不反躬自责，修省心地。听说自己的相好运好，便存侥幸心理，滋长贪欲；听说相和运不好，有厄难，又恐怖仓惶，生退悔心。
target: Buddhism fundamentally reveals the origins and principles of "appearance" and "fate", but it does not teach people to read faces or tell fortunes; because this is to abandon the essence and chase after the unknown, which is futile and unbeneficial. Nowadays, many people in society believe in astrology, face reading, and fortune telling, placing their future and destiny on these, but they do not introspect or cultivate their minds. When they hear that their appearance or luck is good, they harbor a fluke mentality, fostering greed; when they hear that their appearance or luck is not good, that there is misfortune, they become frightened and panicked, producing a sense of regret.

source: 敕文先严兵于堑外拒斗，从夜至旦。敕文谋于众曰：“困兽犹斗，而况于人。贼众知无生路，人自致死，必伤士众，未易可平。
target: The edict first issued a strict warning to the enemy, refusing to fight from the trenches. It was from night to morning. The edict said to the crowd: "The beast is still fighting, but how much more difficult for humans. The enemy is plentiful and knows that there is no way to survive, so the people will die, and the soldiers will be hurt, which will be difficult to deal with.

### Idiom: 激浊扬清
### Meaning: 激冲去；浊脏水；清清水。冲去污水，让清水上来。比喻清除坏的，发扬好的。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 髫幼举家辗转播迁香港，钟爱艺文，淬琢砻砥，开启六十余载抱椠握铅之年岁。毕生投躯政治文化暨新闻执论，先后草创《伴侣》半月刊、《文艺伴侣》月刊、《九十年代》杂志，持秉激浊扬清宏旨，畅申时事评詙缕析；眷注台湾党外运动，推引香港九七浪潮，针砭建白，孤怀闳识；言诚理精，鲜明悠远。平素专务散文、新诗、小品文写作，志切两岸三地现况，悉力政经局势发展；践履民主法治真义，捍卫自由人权保障，蚊思负山，自出胸臆。
target: When a child, the family moved to Hong Kong, he took up the art of writing, and developed a sharp pencil hand. He spent his life giving his voice to political and news writing, starting a sixty-year cycle of exposure to the pen. He has been writing essays, new poetry, short stories, and articles for the past sixty years.

### Idiom: 好学不倦
### Meaning: 喜欢学习，不知疲倦。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 文：林苑卿。长春集团创办人暨总裁林书鸿，这位94岁高龄的石化界‘铁人’，每周除了一定亲自到新竹、苗栗、麦寮、彰化、大发、高雄等厂区视察，日理万机仍好学不倦的他，也维持每天睡前阅读的习惯。近日，他向《财讯》推荐的书单，是被誉为日本经营之神稻盛和夫所写的《稻盛和夫工作的方法》。
target: The writer is Lin Ying-ching. Lin Shu-hong, the 94-year-old “iron man” of the petrochemical industry, visits the factory sites in New Taipei, Miaoli, Mailiao, Changhua, Taichung, Kaohsiung, and other places once a week, except for one week. He is still enthusiastic to learn, and he maintains the habit of reading at night. Recently, he recommended to Business Weekly the book “How to Work” written by Akira Mori, who is known as the God of Management in Japan.

target: Lost in the wind, I missed the old painting.

### Idiom: 故作高深
### Meaning: 本来并不高深，故意装出高深的样子。多指文章故意用些艰深词语，掩饰内容的浅薄。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 对史家司马迁的行处叙事，多有指责。他对宋儒朱熹的解经提出了批评，认为“宋儒所解，则揄扬过侈，牵扯过甚，故作高深。”陈天祥《四书辨疑》多引王若虚说。
target: There are many criticisms about the narrative of the historian Sima Qian's behavior. He criticized Zhu Xi, a Confucian scholar of the Song Dynasty, for his interpretation of the classics, believing that "the interpretation of the Song Confucians is overly exaggerated and excessively entangled, hence it is made to appear profound." Chen Tianxiang's "Four Books Doubts" often quotes Wang Ruoxu's words.

### Meaning: 想什么说什么，为人直爽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 明面上萧慕苓是治国有方的忠臣，但背地里勾结外敌，为了自己的利益通奸卖国。口直心快，淳朴善良、多愁善感，对身边的人与事都十分热心。。却虽身居高位，但以来没架子，跟百姓与下人都打成一片，在群众间颇受称赞。
target: On the surface, Xiao Muling is a loyal minister who manages the country well, but secretly he colludes with foreign enemies and commits adultery and betrays the country for his own benefit. He is straightforward, honest, kind, sentimental, and very enthusiastic about the people and things around him. . Although he holds a high position, he has always been low-key and got along well with the people and servants, and is quite praised among the masses.

source: 因此，我当下的思考倒不真的在于柏林人为何还不戴口罩，而是如何面对世界的纷扰，做到“独坐观心”（《菜根谭》）而改变自己——戒狂言瞽说、戒饕口馋舌、戒损人利己——都能为这个世界带来更多的真、善、美。
target: Therefore, my current thinking is not really about why Berliners still don’t wear masks, but how to face the turmoil of the world and change themselves by “sitting alone and observing the mind” ("Cai Gen Tan") - quit talking arrogantly and blindly Talking, refraining from gluttony, refraining from harming others for self-interest - can all bring more truth, goodness and beauty to this world.

### Idiom: 安贫乐道
### Meaning: 谓安于清贫，以追求圣贤之道为乐。为古代儒家所提倡的立身处世的态度。语本《论语·雍也》：“贤哉回也！一箪食，一瓢饮，在陋巷。人不堪其忧，回也不改其乐。”何晏集解引孔安国曰：“颜渊乐道，虽箪食在陋巷，不改其所乐。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: “扶贫必扶智，治贫先治愚”。但是，“弱鸟可望先飞、至贫可能先富”，关键要看我们的头脑有无这种“先飞”的意识，关键要扫除“安贫乐道”、“穷自在”、“等靠要”、怨天尤人等消极观念，要求我们的党员干部来一个思想解放、观念更新。他还邀请“种树大王”郑邦德等8位农民到地区机关，给副科级以上干部讲改革开放、脱贫致富的体会。
target: "Food Security is a duty, a duty of the people."

context:
### Idiom: 十二金牌
### Meaning: 金牌宋代敕书及紧急军命，用金字牌，由内侍省派人速送。比喻紧急的命令。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 《1812》用柴可夫斯基〈1812序曲〉为背景音乐，以集体肢体演绎在城市里有著一股压抑著现代人生存的隐形暴力，让人喘不过气。《某种演出》采撷了三个历史残篇——三娘教子、十八相送、十二金牌在同一时空压缩并陈，旨在陈述城市中处处充满不安的危机、杀机与转机。我必须承认，我有包袱，一开始我以为做剧场就该承接前人的使命——剧场是严肃的、剧场是深沈的、剧场是探索思想的殿堂、剧场是不能提供娱乐的殿堂、剧场是与观众斗智的场域、剧场是不能做让观众看得懂戏的场域、剧场是批判政治乱象的最后一块净土……于是，那个年代小剧场的作品内容多半都是严肃、沈闷、阐述思想、批判政治、嘲讽时事。
target: The 1812 play uses Chekov's 1812 prelude as the music of the background, a mass physicality which depicts the invisible violence which suppresses modern life. The 'Some kind of performance' took three historical fragments - Three Sisters, 18th and 12th Gifts, into one time capsule, in order to present the cities' anxiety and terror, their threat and their turns. I had to admit, I had a duty, at first I thought the theater was a serious, a gloomy, a temple of philosophy, the temple of the viewer's intellectual challenge, the temple of the viewer's understanding, the temple of the theatre criticizing the political chaos... So, the content of those age theatres mostly were serious, gloomy, a temple of philosophy, a temple of political political satire...

### Idiom: 随波逐尘

### Idiom: 隐天蔽日
### Meaning: 把天遮住，把太阳也挡住了。形容覆盖的面积广大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 曦月的寓意是什么。出处：北魏·郦道元《水经注·江水注》：重岩叠嶂，隐天蔽日，自非停午夜分，不见曦月。曦月的寓意：前程似锦、光辉、积极向上、明朗、贞洁、洁净、智慧、爱与美的象征之义。
target: What is the meaning of the crescent moon? from:北魏·郦道元《水经注·江水注》:重岩叠嶂,隐天蔽日,除非停午夜分,不见曦月。曦月的含义:前程似锦、光辉、积极向上、明朗、贞洁、洁净、智慧、爱与美的象征之义。

source: 伟惊惶，力抗杰兄。时杰兄摘目镜，怒目而视，叱曰:“顺! 予我观之!” 伟对:“否!” 杰抡拳而击伟，伟不敌杰，而受其辱。泣之曰:“杰兄不可...杰兄不可...” 待巫山云雨后，伟惶恐，久不能起。
target: Wei was frightened and fought against Brother Jie. At that time, Brother Jie took off his goggles, glared angrily, and yelled, "Sure! Let me see it!" Wei replied, "No!" He cried and said: "Brother Jie can't do it...Brother Jie can't do it..." After the clouds and rain in Wushan, Wei was frightened and couldn't get up for a long time.

### Idiom: 腰缠万贯
### Meaning: 南朝梁殷芸《小说》：“有客相从，各言所志，或原为扬州刺史，或原多赀财，或原骑鹤上升。其一人曰：‘腰缠十万贯，骑鹤上扬州。’欲兼三者。”后因以“腰缠万贯”谓腰里装着很多钱，形容非常富有。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: weibo
source: 璃月港素为万商云集之地，其中往来行商，不乏腰缠万贯的富豪，也有着诸多踌躇满志的野心家。而在其中，除却璃月七星的威名之外，要说人尽皆知，若不提霄嫣的名字，恐怕有失公允。
target: Liyue Port has always been a gathering place for thousands of merchants, among whom there are many rich and ambitious people who are doing business. Among them, in addition to the prestige of Liyue Seven Stars, it would be unfair to say that everyone knows Xiaoyan's name.

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 爱心人士今天会遇到可爱的小动物，有强烈的领养念头，渴望从中找到乐趣；有晨跑习惯的单身者今天会邂逅心仪的异性，恋情就在那回眸一笑中产生；工作中的你显得太专注，因而忽视同事间的问候，小心会让人觉得你很自命清高！
target: Loving people will meet cute animals today, who are eager to adopt them and find fun in them; those who have a habit of running in the morning will meet a person they like, and a love affair will be born in a glance and a smile; you will appear too focused on your work, which will make people feel that you are too arrogant!

context:
### Idiom: 谨言慎行
### Meaning: 说话小心，行动谨慎。语本《礼记·缁衣》：“故言必虑其所终，而行必稽其所敝，则民谨於言而慎於行。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 有线新闻的专业形象是由新闻部所有同事艰苦经营而来，能够保持下去，全赖大家在新闻专业上的坚持。希望大家明白新闻部是一个整体，无个人、无组别之分，大家的一言一行代表著‘有线新闻’，希望大家协力维系，谨言慎行。新闻厂是一个新闻部的核心，别具象征意义，大家应该好好发挥它的功能，将最快、最新、最专业的新闻报道带给观众，而不应该视它为一个嬉笑玩乐的舞台。
target: The professional image of Cable News is the result of the hard work of all colleagues in the news department. Its continuity relies on everyone's persistence in journalism. I hope everyone understands that the news department is a whole, without individual or group distinctions. Everyone's words and actions represent 'Cable News', and I hope everyone will work together to maintain it, and to speak and act carefully. The news factory is the core of the news department, with symbolic significance. Everyone should fully utilize its functions, bringing the fastest, latest, and most professional news reports to the audience, instead of treating it as a stage for frivolity and fun.

context:
### Idiom: 随波逐尘
### Meaning: 犹言随波逐流。比喻没有坚定的立场，缺乏判断是非的能力，只能随着别人走。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 有时候你会困于名利，有时候你会随波逐尘，你没法像李白那样，拜谒公侯的时候一边给公侯吹彩虹屁，一边又说你要是不用我，我何处皆可去。往往是几次坎坷，人就怂了，就跪了，就再也天真不起来，洒脱不起来。
target: Sometimes you will be trapped in fame and fortune, and sometimes you will be blown away by the wind. You can't be like Li Bai, who blew a rainbow fart and said, "I will go anywhere if you don't need me." Often, it is a few bumps that make people shy, kneel, and never become naive and relaxed.

context:
### Idiom: 化险为夷
### Meaning: 化险阻为平易；转危为安。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 不需要扯一个理由去购买新器材。我们器材控总有无限的欲望，然而金钱是有限的，庄子说以有涯随无涯，是一件很危险的事，所以我们得小心行事，化险为夷需要高明的技巧。而技巧就是「不说的艺术」，因为你心知肚明只要你说你要买什么什么，而理由是多么冠冕堂皇也好，答案永远都是「不」。
target: There is no need to come up with an excuse to buy new equipment. We equipment enthusiasts always have an infinite desire, but money is limited. Zhuangzi once said that it is very dangerous to pursue something infinite with something finite, so we have to be careful and turn potential risks into opportunities. The skill for this is the "art of not speaking", because you know deep down that no matter how grand your reason is for wanting to buy something, the answer will always be "no".

context:
### Idiom: 斗鸡走狗
### Meaning: 使公鸡相斗，使狗赛跑。指旧时剥削阶级子弟游手好闲的无聊游戏。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 老家的语言体系中，对于非正常富贵起来的人，用一个字评价：抖。抖起来的人，斗鸡走狗，有可能玩物丧志。小的时候，父母偶尔用质量不太好的黄豆去换豆腐，就算大大改善生活了。
target: In the language system of my hometown, a word is used to evaluate people who have become wealthy abnormally: "diao". People who become "diao" often engage in gambling and other vices, which may lead to a loss of ambition. When I was young, my parents would occasionally exchange low-quality yellow beans for tofu, which was a significant improvement in our lives.
